__e: You know, y'all underestimate me because I'm short.
You're also underestimating me like a father.
To be honest, I think I might have underestimated how long it'll take.
Underestimated how desperate they must be if you're this important to them now.
I owe you an apology. I underestimated how tough this past year has been for you, and I'm sorry.
